summary: Realtime shadows and higher range for Magelight and Candlelight spells
descriptionHtml:
Changed magic lights radius from 450 to 850 and added realtime shadows.  

Magic lights = Magelight and Candlelight. Both are affected.

Most mods I\'ve seen have RTime shadows on both torches and magic lights, but I wanted shadows ONLY on magic lights. Some had bigger radius but no shadows, and it was weird because a Magelight cast on a room would lit up other rooms if they were close enough. With RT shadows, this won\'t happen :p and it will look natural. 

I\'m using Superb ENB-RL on the screenshots:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11318
(performance preset)

I highly recommend: 
My documents > My games > Skyrim > SkyrimPrefs > iBlurDeferredShadowMask=3

NOTES: 
1- The strange lines and flickering on some shadows are still there, sorry... this is a problem with how the shadows are set up within skyrims engine and I don\'t know how to fix it. If someone knows how please tell me. Setting iBlurDeferredShadowMask to 3, 5 or something higher than 1, helps a little with this problem. ENB\'s detailed shadows help too. 

2- Since one of the official updates for the game, something was changed by bethesda and now, while outside, magic lights don\'t cast a shadow, they only intensify the light from the sun/moon.
author: Erucci13
